    • Method Detail

      • setAuthorizationCode

        public java.lang.String setAuthorizationCode(java.lang.String authCode)
                                      throws BaringoAuthException
        This makes Baringo trade an Imgur OAuth2 authorization code for an active access token and refresh token. If successful, the refresh token is returned and you must save it somewhere if you don't want the user to have to re-auth your app each time. Authorization codes are only good for a few minutes after retrieving them, so this should be called soon thereafter. Refer to the documentation for a handy web server tool that will walk you through the process if Oauth isn't your thing yet.
        Parameters:
        authCode - - an authorization code returned by Imgur
        Returns:
        a refresh token to be saved and passed to Baringo in the future.
        Throws:
        BaringoAuthException - unable to refresh tokens

      • isAccessTokenValid

        public boolean isAccessTokenValid()
                           throws BaringoAuthException
        Returns true if the current user's OAuth2 access token is valid. If there is no authenticated user,
        Returns:
        whether the auth token is valid
        Throws:
        BaringoAuthException - - whomp whomp

        Returns:

      • getRefreshToken

        public java.lang.String getRefreshToken()
        Returns the currently valid refresh token. Call this after passing in your credentials while setting up user authorization, and store it someone securely.
        Returns:
        the current refresh token

      • setRefreshToken

        public void setRefreshToken(java.lang.String refreshToken)
                     throws BaringoAuthException
        This sets the OAuth2 refresh token for user-level authentication. Baringo synchronously contacts Imgur to get an access token. Each client instance can have only one authenticated user at a time.
        Parameters:
        refreshToken - - The user's refresh token.
        Throws:
        BaringoAuthException - couldn't fetch an access token
